casebody.data:
DECEMBER 1973 CALENDAR

STATE OF MONTANA, Plaintiff, vs. HAROLD CARL VAN BERKOM, Defendant. No. 799 DATED this 7th day of December, 1973.

DECISION

The application of the above-named defendant for a review of the sentence of 4 years for Uttering & Delivering a Fraudulent Check, imposed on July 5, 1973, was fully heard and after a careful consideration of the entire matter it is decided that:

The sentence be and remain as originally imposed.

SENTENCE REVIEW DIVISION

Paul G. Hatfield, chairman; Jack D. Shanstrom, Jack L. Green.
